Description: The following statement contains a magic number: if (args.Length < 1 || args.Length > 2)              {                  Console.WriteLine("EasyNetQ.LogReader");                  Console.WriteLine("Usage:");                  Console.WriteLine("EasyNetQ.LogReader.exe <rabbitMqServer> [<vhost>]");                  return;              }

The following statement contains a magic number: var connectionFactory = new ConnectionFactory              {                  HostName = args[0]'                  VirtualHost = args.Length == 2 ? args[1] : "/"              };
